reviewText: This was for my polish mother in law who is 95. She thought some of the more popular DVD's were 'watered down' and not similar to what she used to enjoy. She said this was 'the real deal' . My husband and his brothers and sisters enjoyed it too. They really got a kick out of "Who Stole the Kishka"!! They sing some songs in English, some in Polish. They sound like a group playing real Polish polkas at a wedding or a party. Very, very enjoyable.
